MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate. Following a number of power cuts in your area today, It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:04pm due to an unsafe, damaged electricity cable in our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:09pm on Thursday, 07 January 2021
